content:
I am unclear what the path should be for igs, I know its the [canonncal]/[xxx] it the [xxx] part that Is unclear.... is it the version or the stu? because I have historically used the stu but its not going to work for US Core:

  • For DEQM STU2 version 1.0.0 : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/STU2 or http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/1.0.0
  • For US Core STU3 version 3.1.0: there is already a http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3 so would it be ... http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3-Update or http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/3.1.0 ?
we've using the code - STU3 / 2019Jan etc. So would be STU3.1 ?
